greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of 1's in decimal expansion of prime(n).
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: count1 c x | d == 1    = if x < 10 then c + 1 else count1 (c + 1) x'
| otherwise = if x < 10 then c else count1 c x'
results.author: _Jason Earls_, Jul 06 2003
